login-error: There was a problem with your login.
email-login-error: Something went wrong while sending the email. Please try again later.
email-login-success: A sign in link has been sent to your email address. The link will expire in 24 hours.
sign-up-message: Signing up signifies that you have read and agree to the Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
project-invite: is inviting you to join their project.
invite-member-message: Invite new member by email to join your organization.
remove-project-warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the project and associated members access.
leave-project-success: You have left the project successfully.
allow-project: Allow project members to login using an Identity Provider.
members-of-a-project: Members of a project have access to specific areas, such as a new release or a new application feature.
accept-invite: You can accept the invitation to join the project by clicking the button below.
invite-create-account: To continue, you must either create a new account or login to an existing account.
no-active-project: You do not have any active project.
audit-logs: Audit Logs allow you to track and analyze each member activity.
provision: Provision and de-provision users with your directory provider.
name: Name
identity-provider: Identity Provider will ask you for the following information to configure your SAML app.
setup-saml-auth: Fill out the information below to set up SAML authentication for added security
webhook-create-desc: Create webhook to listen to events from app.
events-description: You can choose which events are sent to which endpoint. By default, all messages are sent to all endpoints.
kickstart-your-enterprise: Kickstart your enterprise app development with Next.js SaaS Starter Kit
create-directory-message: Automatically provision and de-provision users with your directory provider.
directory-sync-message: Directory Sync Provider will ask you for the following information to configure your SCIM app.
